segments.text: Oh , no . It seems that I've lost my train ticket .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you kidding ? The train leaves in an hour . Where did you put it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It was in my pocket , but now I can't find it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is it in the other pocket ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , it is not here . Damn it ! I'm going to have to buy another ticket .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let's go to the inquiry desk first to check whether anyone has got it and turned it in .
segments.speaker: S2
